text: Federal Institute of Bahia (Instituto Federal da Bahia, short IFBA) is a public university of the Brazilian state of Bahia. It was established in 1910. It is one of the largest universities in Bahia as well as one the country's most successful universities. title: Federal Institute of Bahia
